dcterms:creator: A. Geiger
P. Lenz
R. Urtasun
dcterms:description: The KITTI dataset employs global pose coordinates on the local frame. Pose information is provided from the view of the first frame as the center of the coordinate system. The point-clouds in the KITTI dataset consist of 100k points per frame, which are used for odometry estimation in driving scenarios.
dcterms:title: KITTI
